initTables: CREATE TABLE `airport`( `airport_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `flight_id` INT NOT NULL, `plane_id` INT NOT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `runway_id` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`airport_id`));
CREATE TABLE `pilot` ( `pilot_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `plane_id` INT NOT NULL, `employee_id` INT NOT NULL, `certificate_id` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pilot_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `runway` ( `runway_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `length` FLOAT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `direction` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`runway_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `plane` ( `plane_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `model_id` INT NOT NULL, `registration` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`plane_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `employee` ( `employee_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `surname` TEXT NOT NULL, `age` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`employee_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `technician` ( `technician_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `employee_id` INT NOT NULL, `plane_id` INT NOT NULL, `responsibilities` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`technician_id`) );

CREATE TABLE `model` ( `model_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `capacity` FLOAT NOT NULL, `max_speed` FLOAT NOT NULL, `height` FLOAT NOT NULL, `width` FLOAT NOT NULL, `min_runway` FLOAT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`model_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `flight` ( `flight_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `flight_date` DATETIME NOT NULL, `destination` TEXT NOT NULL, `origin` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`flight_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `certificate` ( `certificate_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `model_id` INT NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`certificate_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `passenger` ( `passenger_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `surname` TEXT NOT NULL, `age` BINARY NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`passenger_id`) );
CREATE TABLE `flight_details` ( `pilot_id` INT NOT NULL, `flight_id` INT NOT NULL, `passenger_id` INT NOT NULL );
ALTER TABLE `airport` ADD CONSTRAINT `airport_fk0` FOREIGN KEY (`flight_id`) REFERENCES `flight`(`flight_id`);
ALTER TABLE `airport` ADD CONSTRAINT `airport_fk1` FOREIGN KEY (`plane_id`) REFERENCES `plane`(`plane_id`);
ALTER TABLE `airport` ADD CONSTRAINT `airport_fk2` FOREIGN KEY (`runway_id`) REFERENCES `runway`(`runway_id`);
ALTER TABLE `pilot` ADD CONSTRAINT `pilot_fk0` FOREIGN KEY (`plane_id`) REFERENCES `plane`(`plane_id`);
ALTER TABLE `pilot` ADD CONSTRAINT `pilot_fk1` FOREIGN KEY (`employee_id`) REFERENCES `employee`(`employee_id`);
ALTER TABLE `pilot` ADD CONSTRAINT `pilot_fk2` FOREIGN KEY (`certificate_id`) REFERENCES `certificate`(`certificate_id`);
ALTER TABLE `plane` ADD CONSTRAINT `plane_fk0` FOREIGN KEY (`model_id`) REFERENCES `model`(`model_id`);
ALTER TABLE `technician` ADD CONSTRAINT `technician_fk0` FOREIGN KEY (`employee_id`) REFERENCES `employee`(`employee_id`);
ALTER TABLE `technician` ADD CONSTRAINT `technician_fk1` FOREIGN KEY (`plane_id`) REFERENCES `plane`(`plane_id`);
ALTER TABLE `certificate` ADD CONSTRAINT `certificate_fk0` FOREIGN KEY (`model_id`) REFERENCES `model`(`model_id`);
ALTER TABLE `flight_details` ADD CONSTRAINT `flight_details_fk0` FOREIGN KEY (`pilot_id`) REFERENCES `pilot`(`pilot_id`);
ALTER TABLE `flight_details` ADD CONSTRAINT `flight_details_fk1` FOREIGN KEY (`flight_id`) REFERENCES `flight`(`flight_id`);
ALTER TABLE `flight_details` ADD CONSTRAINT `flight_details_fk2` FOREIGN KEY (`passenger_id`) REFERENCES `passenger`(`passenger_id`);
